com.ooyala.android

Class OoyalaManagedAdsPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.plugin.ManagedAdsPlugin<OoyalaManagedAdSpot>
      • com.ooyala.android.OoyalaManagedAdsPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdsLearnMoreInterface, AdPluginInterface, LifeCycleInterface, StateNotifierListener

    public class OoyalaManagedAdsPlugin
extends ManagedAdsPlugin<OoyalaManagedAdSpot>
implements AdPluginInterface, StateNotifierListener
    Ooyala managed ads plugin manages ooyala and vast ads.
